name: Masking Yourself from the City
description:
Warning

Webgl doesn't work at the moment. Since it's a game-breaking bug we're planning to update the webgl version, but for now use the EXE if you have windows. If you don't have windows.. Sorry...

Premise

It's the night of halloween and you have been awakened. However one other person knows about you. Eliminate them and prevent anyone from finding out, masking the truth that you the monster that you are, exist..

How to Play

Use the left/right arrow keys to traverse the map.

You can use up/down to go through vents located in various places around the city. The goal is to prevent no one from finding out who you are, masking yourself from the city. '

Use Q/E to eliminate as many witnesses as possible, witnesses will show up with an exclamation mark.

You should also use Q/E to empty the newspapers scattered throughout the street.

Mapping Controls

Q / E - to interact with newspapers & citizens

Left/Right - to move

Up/Down - traverse up and down through vents

Oh and if you are reading this.. lookout for a video on our youtube channels..
